title: Were Cast and Crew on the Film ‘Titanic’ Sickened by PCP-Laced Seafood Chowder?
subtitle: Actor Bill Paxton: "Some people were laughing, some people were crying, some people were throwing up.”
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Dozens of people on the set of the film "Titanic" were sickened after eating seafood chowder that had been spiked with the drug PCP on the final day of shooting.
